text: Ryan Yaviel Sánchez Estrada (born 22 June 1998) is a Puerto Rican middle- distance runner specialising in the 800 metres. He won a bronze medal at the 2019 Pan American Games. As still a junior, he represented his country at the 2017 World Championships in London without advancing from the heats. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2015 |World Youth Championships |Cali, Colombia |18th (sf) |800 m |1:57.02 |- |2016 |World U20 Championships |Bydgoszcz, Poland |18th (sf) |800 m |1:49.43 |- |rowspan=2|2017 |Pan American U20 Championships |Trujillo, Peru |bgcolor=gold|1st |800 m |1:46.41 |- |World Championships |London, United Kingdom |41st (h) |800 m |1:50.74 |- |2018 |Central American and Caribbean Games |Barranquilla, Colombia |bgcolor=silver|2nd |800 m |1:46.3 |- |rowspan=2|2019 |Pan American Games |Lima, Peru |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |800 m |1:45.19 |- |World Championships |Doha, Qatar |42nd (h) |800 m |1:54.46 |} ==Personal bests== Outdoor *800 metres – 1:44.82 (Ponce 2019) *1500 metres – 3:49.33 (Gainesville 2019) Indoor *One mile – 4:29.16 (Winston Salem 2019) ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Puerto Rican male middle-distance runners Category:World Athletics Championships athletes for Puerto Rico Category:Pan American Games competitors for Puerto Rico Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Puerto Rico
title: Ryan Sánchez
